content:
Moldova President Maya Sandu commented on today's massive attack of Russia and urged Ukraine to give Ukraine everything necessary for the confrontation of the Russian Federation.

She is about itwroteThe Twitter Twitter.

“This morning, Russia launched more than 90 rockets and 60 Shahd drones in Ukraine, impressing the most important infrastructure. Their aggression knows no boundaries. Ukraine needs to provide everything you need to resist the invasion and protect peace in Europe, ”the Sandu's post reads.

As reported by the Armyinform, on the night of March 22, enemyinflictedcombined rocket-analyzing impact on the objects of critical infrastructure of Ukraine. Anti -air combat destroyed 92 air targets.
title: Moldova President responded to Russian attack: Ukraine needs to provide everything necessary for protection
description: She wrote about this on Twitter.    "This morning, russia launched on the territory of Ukraine...
author: Army Inform
